testButton(MenuItem) - Method in class com.team09.qanda.views.MainActivity
TESTING PURPOSES - to open and test AddQuestionActivity
testQThreadButton(MenuItem) - Method in class com.team09.qanda.views.MainActivity
TESTING PURPOSES - to open and test QuestionThreadActivity
thread_display - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.menu
 
thread_row_layout - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.layout
 
ThreadAdapter - Class in com.team09.qanda
This is a custom adapter for displaying a question thread as a list which includes the question, a heading to display the number of answers followed by a list of answers.
ThreadAdapter(Context, QuestionThread) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.ThreadAdapter
The constructor takes the context of the QuestionThreadActivity using the adapter and the thread to be displayed.
ThreadClickListener - Class in com.team09.qanda.views
 
ThreadClickListener(LocalStorageHandler, Context, ThreadList) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.views.ThreadClickListener
 
ThreadList - Class in com.team09.qanda.models
This class represents a list of QuestionThreads, which is used to display the list of questions on the main screen, as well as the questions stored locally.
ThreadList() - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.models.ThreadList
The default constructor sets up the variables needed by the class.
ThreadList(Sort) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.models.ThreadList
This constructor takes an optional parameter to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object.
ThreadList(Sort, int) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.models.ThreadList
This constructor takes optional parameters to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object, as well as to set the number of threads it should request from the server.
ThreadListAdapter - Class in com.team09.qanda
This is a custom adapter for displaying a list of questions.
ThreadListAdapter(Context, int, ArrayList<QuestionThread>, boolean) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.ThreadListAdapter
The constructor takes the context of the activity using the adapter, the resource id of the custom row layout and the QuestionThread objects to be displayed in the form of an array list.
ThreadListController - Class in com.team09.qanda.controllers
This class makes updates to a ThreadList object.
ThreadListController(ThreadList) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.controllers.ThreadListController
The constructor accepts a ThreadList object, which it will use and update.
ThreadListController(ThreadList, ElasticSearchHandler) - Constructor for class com.team09.qanda.controllers.ThreadListController
An optional constructor with the choice to add a different ElasticSearchHandler.
ThreadPostsView - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.id
 
title_activity_add_question - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
title_activity_picture_view - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
title_activity_question_thread - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
title_activity_search - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
title_activity_thread_display - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
title_activity_user_threads - Static variable in class com.team09.qanda.R.string
 
toString() - Method in class com.team09.qanda.models.Post
The String representation of this Post object.
